moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
